sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都含"懂，知道，明了"之意。
means: know ： 普通用词，多指通过学习、经验或他人传播而得到知识，含直接知道的意味。
learn ： 通常指通过他人而获得消息或情况，侧重从不知到知的变化过程。
comprehend ： 侧重熟悉了解的过程。
understand ： 指对事物已有彻底的认识，不仅知其性质、含义和细节，而且了解其内外的关系。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"理解"之意。
means: understand ： 指对事物已有彻底的认识，不仅知其性质、含义和细节，而且了解其内外的关系。
comprehend ： 较正式用词，指对较复杂的事物能透彻理解其意义。
appreciate ： 语气较弱，指对某事物或意义有充分的理解。着重有能力领悟或觉察。
apprehend ： 指知道某事物或某观念的大概意义，但未能理解其内涵意义，暗含一知半解意味。
grasp ： 从本义抓紧、抓住，引申作"理解、掌握"。

sentence.Network_en: It was clear Cohen didn't understand what Millard was driving at.
sentence.Network_cn: 看得出科恩并不明白米勒德想说什么。

sentence.Network_en: I thought, "Here'ssomeone who'll understand me." So I wrote to her.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想：“这个人会理解我的。”于是开始给她写信。

sentence.Network_en: "Please understand this," she began, a tremble in her voice.
sentence.Network_cn: “请理解这一点，”她开始说道，声音有些发颤。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语构词法 - 搜搜百科 ... overthrow 推翻， understand 理解 broadcast 广播，.
字典中然字的解释 ... (1) 如此,这样,那样[ so;like that] (5) 明白[ understand] (6) 耀;照耀[ dazzle].
字典中明字的解释 ... (3) 点燃,点亮[ fire;light] (5) 懂得,了解[ understand] (7) 阐明,表明[ make known;expound].
新概念英语单词表带音标（第一册） - 豆丁网 ... pleasantly 愉快地 understand 懂，明白 speak 讲，说.

list.abs: 这本无可厚非(Understandable)，由于人家(Other people)来自最高水平联赛，人家齐全了那个气力，女人的心灵之窗多是虚掩着的。 …
英语单词立体记忆 ... an understanding husband 一个通情达理的丈夫 → understanding 理解力，谅解，协定 react on 对…有影响.
标签: flower and of business 柔韧性分类: 认识Understanding ■ 什么是保鲜花保鲜花是利用鲜花和新鲜植物枝叶,经过特殊加工工艺制成的具有天然色泽或人工染色的.
IAS2007国际会计准则 - MBA智库文档 ... comparability 可比性 understandability 可理解性 timeliness 及时性.

encyclopedia.content: Understand is a static analysis toolfor maintaining, measuring, & analyzingcritical or large code bases. Understand是一款分析大型软件工程的有力工具，由Scitools发行。 Understand集成了代码编辑器，代码跟踪器和代码分析器，提供了很强大的界面，将分析结果以各种形式（图形、图表、架构图等）呈现给用户，能很大程度的方便程序员进行开发，维护，调试其代码。 目前Understand支持C/C++/C#, Ada, Java, FORTRAN, De

entry.def: If you understand someone or understand what they are saying, you know what they mean.

example.ex: I think you heard and also understand me...
example.tran: 我想你听到了我的话，也明白我的意思。

example.ex: Rusty nodded as though she understood the old woman...
example.tran: 拉斯蒂点点头，好像听懂了那位老妇人的话似的。

entry.def: If you understand a language, you know what someone is saying when they are speaking that language.

example.ex: I couldn't read or understand a word of Yiddish, so I asked him to translate.
example.tran: 我根本不懂意第绪语，所以请他来翻译。

entry.def: To understand someone means to know how they feel and why they behave in the way that they do.

example.ex: It would be nice to have someone who really understood me, a friend...
example.tran: 要是有个真正理解我的人、有个朋友就好了。

example.ex: Trish had not exactly understood his feelings...
example.tran: 特里希并没有完全理解他的感受。

entry.tran: 知道，明白，了解（所发生的事及其原因）
entry.def: You say that you understand something when you know why or how it happens.

example.ex: They are too young to understand what is going on...
example.tran: 他们还太小，不明白发生了什么事。

example.ex: She didn't understand why the TV was kept out of reach of the patients...
example.tran: 她不明白为什么病人不能看电视。

entry.def: If you understand that something is the case, you think it is true because you have heard or read that it is. You can say that something is understood to be the case to mean that people generally think it is true.

example.ex: We understand that she's in the studio recording her second album...
example.tran: 我们听说她正在录音棚录制她的第二张专辑。

example.ex: I understand you've heard about David...
example.tran: 我知道你们已经听说了戴维的事了。

entry.def: If someone is given to understand that something is the case, it is communicated to them that it is the case, usually without them being told directly.

example.ex: I am given to understand that he was swearing throughout the game at our fans.
example.tran: 我得知整场比赛中他一直冲着我方球迷骂个不停。

entry.def: You can use understand in expressions like do you understand? or is that understood? after you have told someone what you want, to make sure that they have understood you and will obey you.

example.ex: You do not hit my grandchildren, do you understand?...
example.tran: 你不准打我的孙子孙女，明白吗？

means.word_mean: 1. know and comprehend the nature or meaning of;

sentences.sentence: "Does she realize how important this decision is?"
"I understand you have no previous experience?"

auth_sentence.content: How can we best ensure people understand this test?
auth_sentence.res_content: How can we best ensure people understand this test?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How can we best ensure people understand this test?

auth_sentence.content: Mum I understand that very well, my darling.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mum I understand that very well, my darling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mum I understand that very well, my darling.

auth_sentence.content: It's really hard to understand at the moment.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's really hard to understand at the moment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's really hard to understand at the moment.

sentences.en: Don't always rely on others to understand and sympathize.
sentences.cn: 不要老是指望别人的理解和同情。

sentences.en: I can't understand neglecting children like that.
sentences.cn: 对孩子这样毫不经意, 我不能理解。

sentences.en: I can't understand him behaving like that.
sentences.cn: 我不能理解他那种行为。

means.word_mean: 听说, 获悉; 知道, 认为

sentences.en: Do you understand what to do next?
sentences.cn: 你们知道下一步该做什么吗?

sentences.en: She doesn't understand how to look after you.
sentences.cn: 她不知道应该怎么照顾你。

sentences.en: We understand that you'll be returning next year.
sentences.cn: 我们知道你打算明年回来。

sentences.en: It is understood that hard work can bring success.
sentences.cn: 不言而喻, 艰苦的工作可带来成功。

sentences.en: I understand him to be a distant relation.
He is understood to be a man of ability.
sentences.cn: 他被认为是一个有能力的人。

sentences.en: I understood him to say that he wouldn't be able to come.
The President is understood to have secretly left the country.
sentences.cn: 人们获悉总统已秘密地离开了这个国家。

jushi.english: Don't always rely on others to understand and sympathize.
jushi.chinese: 不要老是依赖别人的理解和同情。

jushi.english: The people listen but will not understand.
